column5: I just got a call from a friend that told me he got a regulations book from Lebaron and it states that Bass eason opens on the 4th Saturday of June. That would make it this Saturday.  Can anybody verify???
With a name like Johnny Bass, I'd hate to have you miss this Sat. opener, apparently it is now the 3rd week of June!  good luck this weekend.  Mark

Thanks! My fishing partner will be thrilled. He has not had much luck last few times out! Now we can switch techniques up.I cant wait to throw my first tube and catch a smallie!!!!  The last weekend we fished deep and for the first time didn't pick up a bass, so they are in spawn mode now. Probably still are....  Good luck to all this weekend!!!
you bet your bass it's true. .now it's the 4th  saturday in June instead of the last Saturday.....have fun
Don't listen to these guys, it's the 30th   hehe

I would wait til next weekend just to be safe Johnny.Really I am seriuos here,you dont want to be out there with the rest of them and get nailed for fishing out of season,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,LOL
Can someone confirm that this is true for the Ottawa area also?  thanks Smitty
Well Brian. We will have the regulations on us with proof in writing!!!
You dont need that stick,n book.LOL
except the area that has year round open season
